_x0031_.descText: Take some of the most outstanding pictures of your life: 20MP + 12MP camera modules, Optical Image Stabilisation (OIS), Artistic portraits and unique selfies in Leica image style. Redefine modern portrait photography.
_x0031_.title: HUAWEI + LEICA

_x0032_.descText: Leica Dual Camera 2.0 enables wide aperture photography for stunning artistic portraits with natural bokeh effect. Exclusive depth-of-field technology makes your portraits sharper, clearer, and more beautiful.
_x0032_.title: NATURAL BOKEH EFFECT
